metadata.title: Orbeon Demo: Health History
metadata.description:
This healthcare form shows how to:
  • capture basic patient information
  • ask multiple questions with required answers
  • aks for the user's signature

control-4.text: Medications: List ALL medications you are CURRENTLY taking. (Include all herbals, vitamins and supplements)

venereal-disease_sexually-transmitted-in.label: Have you been exposed to venereal disease/sexually transmitted infection?

result-time-of-last-blood-sugar.label: If diabetic: Result/Time of last blood sugar

constitutional.label: Constitutional
constitutional.hint: fever, heat stroke, weight loss, weight gain, unusually tired, etc.

psychiatric.label: Psychiatric
psychiatric.hint: depression, anxiety, mood swings, insomnia, hallucinations, disorientation, etc.

blood-lymphatic.label: Blood/Lymphatic
blood-lymphatic.hint: high cholesterol, anemia, blood disorders, leukemia, prolonged bleeding, etc.

skin.label: Skin
skin.hint: itching, rash, infection, ulcer, tumors or growths, warts, excessive dryness, etc.

cancer.label: Cancer
cancer.hint: fever, heat stroke, weight loss, weight gain, unusually tired, etc.

allergic-immunologic.label: Allergic/Immunologic
allergic-immunologic.hint: recurrent infections, hay fever, food allergy, drug sensitivity, hives, redness, itching, etc.

hormones-endocrine.label: Hormones (Endocrine)
hormones-endocrine.hint: diabetes, thyroid problems, fatigue, hair loss, hot/cold intolerance, etc.

neurological.label: Neurological
neurological.hint: numbness, weakness, headaches, paralysis, seizures, tremors, tingling, etc.

ear-nose-throat.label: Ear/Nose/Throat
ear-nose-throat.hint: hard of hearing, stuffy nose, earache, cough, dry mouth, etc.

heart-cardiovascular.label: Heart (Cardiovascular)
heart-cardiovascular.hint: high blood pressure, racing pulse, chest pain, unable to exercise, etc.

lungs-respiratory.label: Lungs (Respiratory)
lungs-respiratory.hint: congestion, wheezing, shortness of breath, productive or bloody cough, asthma, etc.

digestion-gastrointestinal.label: Digestion (Gastrointestinal)
digestion-gastrointestinal.hint: stomach upset, diarrhea, constipation, hernia, ulcers, pain/cramps, acid reflux, etc.

muscles-and-bones-musculoskeletal.label: Muscles and bones (Musculoskeletal)
muscles-and-bones-musculoskeletal.hint: muscle pain/cramps, joint pain swelling, stiffness, etc.

urological.label: Urological
urological.hint: painful or frequent urination, burning, impotence, incontinence, infections, etc.

gynecological.label: Gynecological
gynecological.hint: pregnancies, menstrual problems, ovarian and uterine conditions, etc.

breast.label: Breast
breast.hint: cysts, fibroids, pain, numbness, lumps, etc.
